name: Raidraptor - Skull Eagle
effectText:
If this card is detached from an Xyz Monster and sent to the GY to activate that monster's effect: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Raidraptor" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Raidraptor - Skull Eagle" once per turn. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
‚óèIf it is Xyz Summoned: It gains 300 ATK.
